response.overview: MG Rajavel investigates the murder of his twin brother, G Rajavel, in the chaotic village of Mamsapuram. His quest for answers leads him to their friend, Dinesh, unraveling a web of betrayal, identity, and vengeance. As the surviving brother uncovers the shocking truth behind the crime, the narrative builds to a tense and dramatic reveal, setting the stage for a thrilling sequel.
response.title: Thairiyam: Vettai
